title: Dark Touch
overview: Niamh is the lone survivor of a mysterious massacre in which the furniture and objects in her familyâ€™s isolated house took on a monstrous life of their own. The police ignore her wild stories, and the neighbours and social worker who take her into their care try to introduce her to a new life. But Niamh is unable to leave her violent past behind her, endangering everyone who crosses her path.
